scripts.db:generate: npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-ce-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-sage-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-ce-old-database/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate: prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-ce-database/schema.prisma && prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-sage-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-ce-old-database/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push: prisma db push --schema ./prisma-ce-database/schema.prisma && prisma db push --schema ./prisma-sage-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma db push --schema ./prisma-ce-old-database/schema.prisma
scripts.db:pull: prisma db pull --schema ./prisma-ce-database/schema.prisma && prisma db pull --schema ./prisma-sage-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma db pull --schema ./prisma-ce-old-database/schema.prisma
scripts.postinstall: prisma generate --schema ./prisma-ce-database/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ./prisma-sage-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-ce-old-database/schema.prisma
